title: BRAND NEW 3 Bedroom/1 Bathroom Luxury apartment, available now!!!!!
body:

CLOSE TO PRATT UNIVERSITY 


Give me call, text or shoot me an email, there are no questions to big or to small, My name is Serge im here to help.
